import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Flex } from 'fannypack/Flex/Flex';

# Flex

```js
import { Flex } from 'fannypack';
```

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: flex`.

```jsx-live
<Flex>This is a flex</Flex>
```

## Flex Props

<!-- Automatically generated -->

**`overrides`**

```
{ base?: any; }
```

```
string | ComponentClass<any, any> | FunctionComponent<any>
```

**`className`**

```
string
```

**`children`**

```
string | number | boolean | {} | ReactElement<any, string | ((props: any) => ReactElement<any, string | ... | (new (props: any) => Component<any, any, any>)>) | (new (props: any) => Component<any, any, any>)> | ReactNodeArray | ReactPortal | ((props: BoxProps) => ReactNode)
```

**`showBreakpoint`**

```
string
```

**`hiddenBreakpoint`**

```
string
```

**`elementRef`**

```
((instance: any) => void) | RefObject<any>
```

</details>
        

## Theming

<Theme component={Flex} overrides={['Flex.base']}>This is a flex</Theme>
